title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Education
body: Monumental Learning Opportunities Mount Rushmore National Memorial offers a variety of programs including:   ranger programs in your classroom field trips to the memorial lesson plans to use on your own  Browse these pages to find a program that fits your needs. Read more Â»                 Lesson Plans Your students can explore many aspects of Mount Rushmore through lesson plans for grades K-12. Read More        Rangers in the Classroom Bring a park ranger to your classroom! Read More        Parking Scholarships Plan a field trip to Mount Rushmore. Read More        Additional Resources Download a student guide or follow links to find more information and lesson plans about the National Park Service and the nation's history. Read More
